attributes.additional_details:
Where a pregnancy occurs resultant of consensual  sex with a female of age there needs to be legislation to ensure the following should apply:-
1.It should be the responsibility of the mother to notify the father without delay.
2.It shall be illegal for the mother to have an abortion or arrange adoption without the fathers written  consent, unless in the case of a life threatening situation to the mother or unborn child.
It is wrong to hold the father liable when a child is born but ignor his rights during pregnancy
